short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing with a language assistant, email writing suggestions, and AI chat powered by LLMs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your browsing companion. Get instant word definitions, smart email writing suggestions, and chat with AI using local or remote LLM models. Enhance your productivity and language skills effortlessly.

Both local and remote LLMs are supported. More features to come.
